description:
The ducks at Firefly Lagoon are fun to watch.  But, you need to watch out when they fly overhead!  
Transform Dot into a duck to join the fun!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn on yellow lights. Then make Dot play a duck sound when Dot is moved down.

hints.description: Drag out a Yellow light and a Duck sound. Link Start to the light using an Auto cue. Link the light to the sound using a Move Down cue.

puzzles.description: After playing the duck sound, make Dot randomly choose to turn on red lights or yellow lights.

hints.description: Link the states with Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dot wait for 1.0 s then play the Awww #1 sound. Then make Dot automatically turn on yellow lights.
puzzles.introduction: Flying is tough work!  If you don't press the button in time, Dot will get tired.

hints.description: Link the Red light to the Awww #1 sound using a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s. Link the Awww #1 sound to the Yellow light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dot play the raspberry sound when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction:
Yikes!  
Look out below!  Ducks rarely take a break, even when they gotta go!

hints.description: Drag out the silly sound. Set the sound to Raspberry. Link the Red light to the sound using a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After playing the raspberry sound, make Dot automatically say "Do it!" Then make Dot automatically turn on yellow lights.

hints.description: Drag out a brave sound. Set the sound to "Do it!". Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Move Dot up and down to fly. Press the top button at the right time to make Dot play the raspberry sound three times.
puzzles.introduction:
Alright!  
Time for a foul flock of fowl!
